articles.title: 2015 match-fixer Jean Symes criminally charged, says anti-corruption chief
articles.description: Former Lions cricketer Jean Symes has been charged by the Hawks with perjury for his role in the 2015/16 Ram Slam match-fixing scandal, Cricket SA's Anti-Corruption Unit chief Louis Cole confirmed.
articles.content:
• Former Lions cricketer Jean Symes has been charged with perjury.
